message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the construction of authentication codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The use of combinatorial designs suggests a connection to discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The concept of multi-fold secrecy is also relevant to coding theory (cs.CC) and security and privacy (cs.SI).
